item.title: An Evolution of Office Attire
item.description: ​ A case for why you should wear a turtleneck, or at least consciously decide on how you wish to present yourself. In Summary; An Integration of Form and Function Casual Elegance The Notion of a Uniform It’s Showtime Aesthetics are kind of important, the way your experience in life is embodied is dictated by the ways in which yo ​ Images This is what a turtleneck looks like Gydw1n

item.title: What is a Napkin?
item.description: Akin to the “Ponderings” page, this collection of “Napkins” is a collection of ideas that I felt were better expressed in a series of paragraphs as opposed to a question. Some of the world’s best ideas were incarnated on a napkin, these might be a few of mine. ​ The rest of this page will be a collection of examples for different features supported in the variant of markdown powering this website – pretty stuff.
